name: Catto Boi and the Legendary Fragments
name_original: Catto Boi and the Legendary Fragments
description:
This game is not for kids! If you are under 16, do not play this game. People who are easily disturbed or suffer from epilepsy may not have a safe experience playing this game.

*

Catto is on a brand new adventure once again!

With new updated graphics and gameplay, join Catto as he goes off to find 6 lost fragments on his island, and help defeat the fabled legendary beast!

But it seems another beast has returned too...

*

Join the community Discord! discord.gg/E6ZuKH9

System requirements: https://pastebin.com/uGzjETsK

*

Important info, please read:   

This game will not damage anything on your system - it is perfectly safe to run. Please keep this in mind before you play.

Read the readme.txt that comes with the game for more information.
